DOC.brief_summary: This study propose investigate effect cryotherapy laser therapy response strenuous exercise-induced muscle damage biceps brachii muscle ( muscle arm ) . All individual undergo strenuous exercise protocol ( 2 series 10 contraction non-dominant elbow flexor ) three assessment ( pre , post 48hr exercise ) , compose pain sensation , measure strength muscle activation .
DOC.criteria: Female sex Aged 18 28 year Healthy , consider active accord International Physical Activity Questionnaire Short Form ( IPAQ ) Engaging physical activity involve upper limb least 2 time week Exhibiting shoulder joint , elbow nondominant hand integrity Not history osteomyoarticular injury assess limb last 6 month , neurological , visual and/or noncorrected auditory impairment . Furthermore could allergic ice ( verified ice cube test ) absolute contraindication use laser ( cancer pregnancy ) . Not understanding command give protocol and/or inadequate performance assessment .
